search.query: | inputlookup sto_asset_map_dashboards | stats count by splunk_server | eval label=splunk_server . " (" . count . ")"
| inputlookup sto_asset_map_dashboards where splunk_server="$srv$" | stats count by eai:appName | eval label='eai:appName' . " (" . count . ")"

table.title: This is for the list of dashboards

search.query: | inputlookup sto_asset_map_dashboards where splunk_server="$srv$" AND eai:appName="$app$" | lookup sto_dashboard_usage app AS eai:acl.app, view AS title OUTPUT count AS recent, last_hit | stats max(last_hit) AS last_hit, sum(recent) AS recent, count by eai:acl.app, eai:acl.sharing, eai:acl.owner, label, title | eval header=label . " (" . count . ")" | table header, title, eai:acl.app eai:acl.owner, eai:acl.sharing, count, recent, last_hit | convert ctime(last_hit) | rename header AS "Dash Title (Searches)", title AS "Filename", eai:acl.owner AS "Owner", eai:acl.app AS "App Name", eai:acl.sharing AS "Permissions", count AS "Searches", recent AS "Recent Visits", last_hit AS "Last Visit Time"

index=_internal sourcetype=splunk_web_access source=*web_access.log* GET app=$app|s$ view=$sdo_dash_title|s$ | rex "(?<response_ms>\d+)ms$" | timechart count AS Hits, avg(response_ms) AS "Average Response (ms)"

| inputlookup sto_asset_map_dashboards where splunk_server="$srv$" AND eai:appName="$app$" AND title="$sdo_dash_title$" | rename comment AS "This is to deal with clones" | search eai:acl.owner="$sdo_dash_owner$" | table label title search_num input_flag base_name main_search | rename label AS "Dash Title", title AS "Filename", search_num AS "Search Number", input_flag AS "Search Type (body / input)", base_name AS "Search Name", main_search AS "Search String"
